data.actual_result: Green circle stays around the last user who was talking even after you disconnect. https://gyazo.com/330c077d82eeb5b374c41c637fdbf10c
data.expected_result: Green circle shouldnt be there once you disconnect.
data.short_description: Green circle stays around a users name in a group call DM if you disconnect while they are talking
data.steps_to_repro: - start a group call in DMs - Disconnect while another user is talking
